title: All other guidelines and norms shall be followed as may be decided by the Government of India or State Government, from time to time in respect of “Pradhan Mantri Awas Yojana”
clause_text: All other guidelines and norms shall be followed as may be decided by the Government of India or State Government, from time to time in respect of “Pradhan Mantri Awas Yojana”.
